subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: With nine holes to play, Geoff Ogilvy clung to a two-stroke lead over Jim Furyk and Vijay Singh in the rain-delayed W.G.C.-CA Championship on Sunday.
snippet: With nine holes to play, Geoff Ogilvy clung to a two-stroke lead over Jim Furyk and Vijay Singh in the rain-delayed W.G.C.-CA Championship on Sunday.
